author: Kuro
description: Allows dropping and elevating owner permissions.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores bot owner ids so the bot owners can elevate their owner permissions.
short: Allows to drop and elevate owner permissions.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing `Sudo`! Get started with `[p]help Sudo`.
Keep in mind that this cog doesn't update bot.owner_ids on it's own, so anytime there's a change on the current bot owners please reload this cog.
